original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares down in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s shares edged down in mid day, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index was down 0.61 percent or 68.05 points to 11,001.39, while the most liquid index S&P SL20 was down 0.71 percent or 24.70 points to 3,174.29.
Losers during mid day trade were Sampath Bank, Hatton National Bank and Hayleys. (Colombo/July26/2023)
